sentences.sContent: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.sContent_eng: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.sCn: 山顶上升气流强度随速矢端迹曲率加大而稍有加强。

sentences.sContent: Pilots navigate through a growing thunderstorm's updraft and set off silver iodide flares.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pilots navigate through a growing thunderstorm's updraft and set off silver iodide flares.
sentences.sCn: 飞行员乘着越积越大的暴风雨的上升气流，点燃碘化银弹。

synos.tran: 上升气流；[建]向上之排气

remMethod.val: up(向上) + draft(排水， 排气) → 向上排气 → 上升气流
